summary: Encapsulates the results of a TensorFlow encoder‑decoder model that generates text using beam sampling, exposing the generated token sequences together with optional scores, beam tracking information, and the full set of encoder and decoder hidden states and attention tensors.
business_intent: Enable downstream applications to retrieve and analyse the detailed output of beam‑sampled generation, such as ranking candidate sequences, visualising attention patterns, or feeding hidden representations into further processing pipelines.
